thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: zeb

author: zeb
title: zeb
text: I love thriftbooks.com great prices reasonably fast shipping and great customer service out of the many books I have ordered I only had one I wasn't satisfied with it had pages missing but I sent an email that night and the next morning I had a reply telling me to give them the item number and they would ship out a new one free of charge and to not even bother shipping the bad copy back if I remember correctly they even express shipped the new copy I have and would again recommend thriftbooks.com to anyone who loves to read and enjoys saving money
